title: Motorola G7
description: Moto G7 (stylized by Motorola as moto g7)[2] is a series of Android smartphones developed by Motorola Mobility, a subsidiary of Lenovo; it is the seventh generation of the Moto G family and was first released on 7 February 2019. As with the last generations which introduced the Plus and Play variants, this series has introduced the Power variant as well. There are 4 variants in the seventh series.
